column4: I just got a apple emac g4. There is no os on the computer. I downloaded ubuntu 10.04 powerpc iso and put it in the cd tray. However when I put it on I get the normal folder with a question mark. Is there something I should push, like f2 for the pc?
I'm not sure holding c will work, it doesn't for me, so if you have to enter open firmware (cmd+shift+o+f on bootup) and run "boot cd:,\\:tbxi
don't listen to DJ, hopefully you know better.
